name: I like ThoseWhoMake.com
description:
As 2013 comes to an end, if you've enjoyed Those Who Make this past year and the daily updating of content, consider supporting the site! Any amount you can muster is much appreciated and shows me that there is value in the content that I post. Similar to a waiter at a restaurant, my job is to bring enjoyable content to your table and tips are a way of letting me know that I'm doing a good job... plus they help to pay the bills...

If you'd like to support with an amount that is not present below (or support with something else, like... cupcakes!), send me an email -  thosewhomake@gmail.com

name: Natural Leather Bracelet
description:
If you're looking for a bracelet that will develop a worn in appearance/patina as you live your life and go on (hopefully) lots of adventures, take a gander at this. I have yet to figure out the right name for this bracelet, so here are two names that didn't get picked : 

brace (yourself) lets...
lets wrap this up... 

+ 4 oz Natural Veg. Tanned Leather from a tannery in Pennsylvania. This leather will darken over time and develop a great patina that'll you'll see first hand as you wear it below your hand!
+ Waxed linen thread to wrap around the leather buttons. Enough length that you may even want to cut some of it off.
+ Antique brass rivets

.75" wide w/ leather end buttons.

I've left a few options for length, it really all depends on how you wear your bracelets and how close you want the leather ends to be. As you can tell from the photos, I like to leave some space between the ends and have the the thread be a noticeable part of the bracelet. 

If you'd like a different length than what is present, send an email to thosewhomake(!@)gmail.com after checkout.

name: Tool Roll-Up Case
description:
Need something to neatly organize your pencils for that nude drawing class; or want to bring those smaller leather working tools from your shop to your friend's shop; or how about something to hold all of those smaller bicycle tools for fixing flats and keeping you in tune? 

All of those situations are why I crafted this carrying case that can be folded, rolled, secured and nicely keep all of those tools in one organized space. This carrying case is made especially for those smaller tools, accessories, writing utensils, knitting needles, stick collections, bicycle repair kits, and whatever else you can imagine.
 
12.5" wide X 8.75" tall
Pocket is 4" tall and split into 1.5"(x4), 2"(x2), 2.25"(x1)

- Navy 13.5 oz waxed cotton canvas (two layers)
- Natural vegetable tanned leather (4 oz. from a tannery in PA) + (will darken over time and develop a great patina) 
- Navy heavy duty Nylon Thread  
- Antique brass screw-in stud

Hand stamped with the Proudly Say name and the case number (number of case's made by my own two hands).

(Spot clean waxed canvas only)  + Made to order - current turnaround time is 1 week.

name: Carryall Bag - Black
description:
A heavy duty carryall bag that is perfect for everyday carry. 

One pocket on the outside that will hold your latest reading material/tablet.

One smaller pocket on the inside that will hold your keys/phone + a few writing instruments.

Measurements are approximately - 
16" tall x 7"wide x 
14.5" long (base) | 19" long (top when flattened) | 16" long (average/carried)  
10" handle drop

Materials include - 
- Black 20oz waxed cotton canvas 
- Natural vegetable tanned leather that will darken over time and develop a great patina   
- White cotton seam tape 
- Black + White heavy duty Nylon Thread 
+ Antique brass rivets with leather washers

All materials sourced in the USA.
All bags made from start to finish by Michael Ariel under the name Proudly Say. I also run Those Who Make.

Hand stamped leather label on the inside with the Proudly Say name and the bag number (number of bags made by my own two hands).

(Spot clean waxed canvas only)  + Made to order - current turnaround time is 1 week.

name: Apron - Indigo Denim
description:
This handcrafted apron is made to take the hits and protect your clothes while you do your magic in the workshop / kitchen / cafe / parlor /etc. 
Consists of an upper chest pocket which is divided to hold your writing utensils and phone + a large waist pocket which is divided down the middle.

Measures : 31.5"L x 29.5" W (top is 9"W)

Materials include - 
- 13.5oz 100% cotton indigo denim.
- 100% white cotton tape for the neck and waist straps (which are adjustable and removable when you decide it's time to give the apron a good wash)
- Natural vegetable tanned leather strap holders that will darken over time and develop a great patina.
+ Antique brass rivets

All materials sourced in the USA.  
All aprons made from start to finish by Michael Ariel under the name Proudly Say. I also run Those Who Make.

Hand stamped leather label on the back with the Proudly Say name and the apron number (number of aprons made by my own two hands).

*The straps are displayed to show off the leather, but when it comes time to use the aprons, for more security the straps will need to be tied onto the strap holders*

 + Made to order - current turnaround time is 1 week

name: Half-Apron - Indigo Denim
description:
This handcrafted half-apron is made to take the hits and protect your lower half while you do your magic in the workshop / kitchen / cafe / parlor /etc.  
Consists of two large pockets + two small pockets (for your writing instruments, smaller tools, and phone)

Measures : 17.5"L x 24.75" W 

Materials include - 
 - 13.5oz 100% cotton indigo denim.  
- 100% white cotton tape for the waist straps (which are adjustable and removable when you decide it's time to give the apron a good wash)  
- Natural vegetable tanned leather strap holders that will darken over time and develop a great patina.  
+ Antique brass rivets

All materials sourced in the USA.

All aprons made from start to finish by Michael Ariel under the name Proudly Say. I also run Those Who Make.

Hand stamped leather label on the back with the Proudly Say name and the apron number (number of aprons made by my own two hands).

+ Made to order - current turnaround time is 1 week

name: Card Case - Natural Leather
description:
Need something to hold your credit cards / business cards/ mass transit cards + a few folded bills? I present, in all of its natural leather glory, a card case with a big ol' scoop on one side (and scoop-less on the other side), for getting your cards out easily!

3.75" tall x 3" wide (2.75" from thread to thread)

- Natural vegetable tanned leather (4 oz. from a tannery in PA) + (will darken over time and develop a great patina) 
- Waxed linen thread 

All card cases are made from start to finish by Michael Ariel under the name Proudly Say. Cut, punched and stitched by hand.

Hand stamped on the inside with the Proudly Say name and the card case number (number of card cases made by my own two hands).

Made to order - current turnaround time is 1 week

name: Horizontal Three Pocket Wallet - Natural Leather
description:
Need something to hold your credit cards / business cards/ mass transit cards + a few folded bills? I present, in all of its natural leather glory, a front pocket friendly card/folded bills holder with three slots for your goods.

2 5/8" tall x 4 1/4" wide (4" from thread to thread) 

- Natural vegetable tanned leather (4 oz. from a tannery in PA) + (will darken over time and develop a great patina)   
- Waxed linen thread

All card cases are made from start to finish by Michael Ariel under the name Proudly Say. Cut, punched and stitched by hand.

Hand stamped on the inside with the Proudly Say name and the card case number (number of card cases made by my own two hands).

Made to order - current turnaround time is 1 week

name: CARRYLESS BAG - Navy
description:
A flat, durable bag for those who keep (or want to keep) their carry to a minimum.

One appropriately sized main compartment that can hold your laptop/tablet + folders + that book on birds and those binoculars for those moments when you just have to catch your breath and watch some birds.

One large pocket on the outside that will hold your newspaper/waterbottle/lunch or your secret candy stash

One smaller pocket on the inside that will hold your keys/phone + a few writing instruments

Measures 15.5" tall x 15.5" wide, with a 4.5" handle drop

Includes a natural leather shoulder strap (see the last photo for how it looks)

Materials include -   
- Navy 20oz waxed cotton canvas 
 - Natural vegetable tanned leather that will darken over time and develop a great patina 
 - White cotton seam tape 
 - Navy + White heavy duty Nylon Thread   
+ Antique brass rivets + snap button closures with leather washers

All materials sourced in the USA.  All bags made from start to finish by Michael Ariel under the name Proudly Say. I also run Those Who Make.

Hand stamped leather label on the inside with the Proudly Say name and the bag number (number of bags made by my own two hands).

(Spot clean waxed canvas only)  + Made to order - current turnaround time is 1 week.

name: Belt Key Fob - Natural Leather
description:
This leather key fob will add a nice touch of handmade to your everyday carry. Wrap it around your belt and save the belt loops on your pants from that extra weight.

 - Natural vegetable tanned leather (4 oz. from a tannery in PA) + (will darken over time and develop a great patina) 
 - Antique brass snap button closure + Swivel Snap  
- Nickel Plated Split Key Ring

Measures 1" x 5.5" (closed) / 8.5" (open)

Hand stamped on the inside with the Proudly Say name and the key fob number (number of key fobs made by my own two hands).

name: Key Fob - Natural Leather
description:
This leather key fob will add a nice touch of handmade to your everyday carry. Fits nice and deep into your back pocket, so it won't pop out while you walk or if you decide to do an impromptu stretching session. And the leather is long enough that when you carry it, you can grip it by the leather body instead of holding it by the keys or snap.

- 8-10 oz Natural vegetable tanned leather (body)
- 4 oz Natural vegetable tanned leather (end caps)
(leather will darken over time and develop a great patina)
- Antique Brass Rivets + Swivel Snap
- Nickel Plated Split Key Ring

Measures 6.5" x 1"

Hand stamped on the back with the Proudly Say name and the key fob number (number of key fobs made by my own two hands).

I can also stamp initials onto the front at no extra cost - just make sure I get that note - thosewhomake@gmail.com

name: Prototype Navy Waxed Canvas Bag
description:
A heavy duty waxed canvas carryall bag, with short natural veg. tanned leather handles (which will patina nicely).

One pocket on the outside that will hold your latest reading material/tablet.

One smaller pocket on the inside that will hold your keys/phone + a few writing instruments

Materials include - 
- Navy 22oz waxed cotton canvas 
- Natural vegetable tanned leather that will darken over time and develop a great patina 
- White cotton seam tape 
- Navy heavy duty Nylon Thread 
+ Antique brass rivets with leather washers

This bag was a prototype, so there are some bits that are a little off, but they do not diminish the quality of the bag. For instance, the handles are about an inch off center, and there are a few extra rivets up top - so it's definitely a one of a kind bag, with slight imperfections; but still a very useful, long lasting bag as you would expect from waxed canvas + leather.

All materials sourced in the USA. 

Hand stamped leather label on the outside with the Proudly Say name and the bag number (number of bags made by my own two hands).

(Spot clean waxed canvas only)
